Developer Terms of Use
des: Neowin is a technology news website. Editorial focus is predominantly on Microsoft-related news, but the site also offers analysis and reporting on mobile news, tech trends, gadgets and new technological developments, as well as in-depth product reviews.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
